task.summary: I improved the tactical HUD. Added images too.

Fixed issue with renderer.
Solution: add renderer.activateAllLayers(map)

Fixed issue with renderer.
Solution: add renderer.activateAllLayers(map)

Added distinction between Tactic and Strategic.
Now Agents will be re-structured (units and buildings).

Agents re-structured. Units can be created without instance.
Attacking own location is not possible.
Added a simple "univers" screen. I should add a startup menu like the shooter example.

MESSAGE.value: I improved the tactical HUD. Added images too.
World and Scene separated. However, the selection renderer doesn't work anymore.

Fixed issue with renderer.
Solution: add renderer.activateAllLayers(map)

Added distinction between Tactic and Strategic.
Now Agents will be re-structured (units and buildings).

Agents re-structured. Units can be created without instance.
Attacking own location is not possible.
Added a simple "univers" screen. I should add a startup menu like the shooter example.
